participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Cautious and nurturing, she enjoys trying new things but has a strong fear of certain creatures.
participant_1.background: I am terrified of scorpions. I have a german shepherd named Barnaby. My favorite color is grey. My father drove a car for NASCAR. I am employed by the US Postal Service.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, he loves to explore new culinary delights and enjoys the thrill of fishing.
participant_2.background: Hey my name is Larry and I am a chef. If I am not cooking in the kitchen then I am definitely on the water. I also love comic books. Spiderman is my favorite.

content.text: Hi Larry, what do you enjoy doing on your days off?
I love to cook and fish, but I also love to read comic books.
That's great! I love cooking too, but I don't know how to fish.
I can teach you how to fish, if you'd like.
That would be great! I'm free next weekend.
Perfect! I'll pick you up early in the morning.
Great! What do you like to cook?
I love to cook all kinds of food, but my specialty is seafood.
I love seafood! I'm sure your food will be delicious.
I'm also a big fan of comic books. What are some of your favorites?
My favorite comic book is Spiderman. I love his character and his stories.
Spiderman is great! I love his origin story.
Me too! It's one of the best comic book stories ever written.
I'm glad to meet someone who shares my love of cooking and comic books.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
